languages.text: "Сожалею, Ваша Светлость, но мы не могли принять ваш запрос на эвакуацию. {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Вокс-связь{/g} была забита омерзительными помехами — криками, богохульными гимнами и чем-то еще не менее жутким. Те, кто слушал их слишком долго, сошли с ума. Несколько десятков операторов утратили рассудок, дежуря на вокс-передатчике в надежде услышать вас. Увы, ни один из них не преуспел".

traits.locale_text: "Сожалею, Ваша Милость, но мы не могли принять ваш запрос на эвакуацию. {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Вокса-связь{/g} была забита омерзительными помехами — криками, богохульными гимнами и чем-то еще не менее жутким. Те, кто слушал их слишком долго, сошли с ума. Несколько десятков операторов утратили рассудок, дежуря на вокс-передатчике в надежде услышать вас. Увы, ни один из них не преуспел".

languages.text: "I do apologise, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but we were unable to receive your request for evacuation. The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-link{/g} was overrun with vile interference — screams, blasphemous hymns, and other equally sinister noises. Any who listened to the interference for a protracted period lost their sanity. Several dozen operators went mad monitoring the vox-caster in the hope of hearing your voice. Each one of them waited in vain."
languages.original_text: "Сожалею, Ваша Светлость, но мы не могли принять ваш запрос на эвакуацию. {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Вокс-связь{/g} была забита омерзительными помехами — криками, богохульными гимнами и чем-то еще не менее жутким. Те, кто слушал их слишком долго, сошли с ума. Несколько десятков операторов утратили рассудок, дежуря на вокс-передатчике в надежде услышать вас. Увы, ни один из них не преуспел".

The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox link{/g} was overrun with vile interference — screams, blasphemous hymns, and other equally sinister noises. Any who listened to the interference for a protracted period lost their sanity. Several dozen operators went mad monitoring the vox-caster in the hope of hearing your voice. Each one of them waited in vain."

Each one of them waited in vain."

"I do apologise, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but we were unable to receive your request for evacuation. The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-link{/g} was overrun with vile interference — screams, blasphemous hymns, and other equally sinister noises. Any who listened to the interference for a protracted period lost their sanity. Several dozen operators went mad monitoring the vox-caster in the hope of hearing your voice. Each one of them waited in vain."

languages.text: “我很抱歉，大人，但我们并没有收到您的疏散请求。{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵链接{/g}被邪恶的干扰淹没了，充满了尖叫声、亵渎神明的唱诗声，以及其他同样邪恶的声音。无论是谁，长时间聆听这些干扰的声音都会失去理智。之前有几十名操作员都在监听着通讯器，希望能听到您的声音，但他们全都发疯了。所有人的等待都徒劳无功。”
languages.original_text: "I do apologise, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but we were unable to receive your request for evacuation. The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-link{/g} was overrun with vile interference — screams, blasphemous hymns, and other equally sinister noises. Any who listened to the interference for a protracted period lost their sanity. Several dozen operators went mad monitoring the vox-caster in the hope of hearing your voice. Each one of them waited in vain."

traits.locale_text: “我很抱歉，大人，但我们并没有收到您的疏散请求。{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵链接{/g}被邪恶的干扰淹没了，充满了尖叫声、亵渎神明的唱诗声，以及其他同样邪恶的声音。无论是谁，长时间聆听这些干扰的声音都会失去理智。之前有几十名操作员都在监听着通讯器，希望能听到您的声音，但他们全都发疯了。所有人的等待都徒劳无功。”

languages.text: 「申し訳ありません、陛下、ですが避難要請を受け取れなかったのです。{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}リンクは、悲鳴、冒涜的な賛美歌、その他の不吉なノイズなど、下劣な干渉であふれかえっていました。この妨害電波を長時間聞いていた者は、正気を失ってしまったほどです。数十人のオペレーターが、御身のお声を聞こうと、必死に音声通信送受信装置を監視していたのです。ですが、そのどれもが無為な時間となってしまいました」
languages.original_text: "I do apologise, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but we were unable to receive your request for evacuation. The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-link{/g} was overrun with vile interference — screams, blasphemous hymns, and other equally sinister noises. Any who listened to the interference for a protracted period lost their sanity. Several dozen operators went mad monitoring the vox-caster in the hope of hearing your voice. Each one of them waited in vain."

traits.locale_text: 「申し訳ありません、{mf|陛下|陛下}、ですがあなたの避難要請を受け取れなかったのです。{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}リンクは、悲鳴、冒涜的な賛美歌、その他の不吉なノイズなど、下劣な干渉であふれかえっていました。この妨害電波を長時間聞いていた者は、正気を失ってしまったほどです。数十人のオペレーターが、あなたの声を聞こうと、必死に音声通信送受信装置を監視していたのです。ですが、そのどれもが無為な時間となってしまいました」

「申し訳ありません、陛下、ですが避難要請を受け取れなかったのです。{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}リンクは、悲鳴、冒涜的な賛美歌、その他の不吉なノイズなど、下劣な干渉であふれかえっていました。この妨害電波を長時間聞いていた者は、正気を失ってしまったほどです。数十人のオペレーターが、御身のお声を聞こうと、必死に音声通信送受信装置を監視していたのです。ですが、そのどれもが無為な時間となってしまいました」

languages.text: "Bitte entschuldigt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber wir haben Euer Ersuchen um Evakuierung nicht empfangen. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox-Link{/g} war voller Störungen – Schreie, gotteslästerliche Gesänge und andere vergleichbar üble Geräusche. Wer diesen Interferenzen länger zuhörte, hat den Verstand verloren. Einige Dutzend Personen vom Bedienpersonal sind wahnsinnig geworden, als sie den Vox-Transmitter überwachten, in der Hoffnung, Eure Stimme zu hören. Sie alle haben vergeblich gewartet."
languages.original_text: "I do apologise, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but we were unable to receive your request for evacuation. The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-link{/g} was overrun with vile interference — screams, blasphemous hymns, and other equally sinister noises. Any who listened to the interference for a protracted period lost their sanity. Several dozen operators went mad monitoring the vox-caster in the hope of hearing your voice. Each one of them waited in vain."

traits.locale_text: "Bitte entschuldigt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber wir haben Euer Ersuchen um Evakuierung nicht empfangen. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox-Link{/g} war voller Störungen – Schreie, gotteslästerliche Gesänge und andere vergleichbar üble Geräusche. Wer diesen Interferenzen länger zuhörte, hat den Verstand verloren. Einige Dutzend Personen vom Bedienpersonal sind wahnsinnig geworden, als sie den Vox-Transmitter überwachten, in der Hoffnung, Eure Stimme zu hören. Sie alle haben vergeblich gewartet."

languages.text: « Toutes mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie, mais nous n'étions pas en mesure de recevoir votre demande d'évacuation. La {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}liaison-vox{/g} était submergée d'ignobles interférences... des cris, des cantiques blasphématoires et autres nuisances tout aussi sinistres. Tous ceux qui ont écouté ces interférences pendant une période prolongée ont perdu la raison. Plusieurs dizaines d'opérateurs sont devenus fous en surveillant l'émetteur vox dans l'espoir de vous entendre. Hélas en vain. »
languages.original_text: "I do apologise, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but we were unable to receive your request for evacuation. The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-link{/g} was overrun with vile interference — screams, blasphemous hymns, and other equally sinister noises. Any who listened to the interference for a protracted period lost their sanity. Several dozen operators went mad monitoring the vox-caster in the hope of hearing your voice. Each one of them waited in vain."

traits.locale_text: « Toutes mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie, mais nous n'étions pas en mesure de recevoir votre demande d'évacuation. La {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}liaison-vox{/g} était submergée d'ignobles interférences... des cris, des cantiques blasphématoires et autres nuisances tout aussi sinistres. Tous ceux qui ont écouté ces interférences pendant une période prolongée ont perdu la raison. Plusieurs dizaines d'opérateurs sont devenus fous en surveillant l'émetteur-vox dans l'espoir de vous entendre. Hélas en vain. »

languages.text: «Lo lamento, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero no pudimos recibir su solicitud de evacuación. El {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vocoenlace{/g} estaba lleno de una interferencia vil: gritos, himnos blasfemos y otros ruidos igual de siniestros. Escucharla de forma continuada causaba estragos en la cordura de los operadores, y hemos perdido a decenas de ellos con la esperanza de escuchar su voz. Su sacrificio fue en vano».
languages.original_text: "I do apologise, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but we were unable to receive your request for evacuation. The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-link{/g} was overrun with vile interference — screams, blasphemous hymns, and other equally sinister noises. Any who listened to the interference for a protracted period lost their sanity. Several dozen operators went mad monitoring the vox-caster in the hope of hearing your voice. Each one of them waited in vain."

traits.locale_text: «Lo lamento, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero no pudimos recibir su solicitud de evacuación. El {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vocoenlace{/g} estaba lleno de una interferencia vil: gritos, himnos blasfemos y otros ruidos igual de siniestros. Escucharla de forma continuada causaba estragos en la cordura de los operadores, y hemos perdido a decenas de ellos con la esperanza de escuchar su voz. Su sacrificio fue en vano».

languages.text: "Özür dilerim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ancak tahliye talebinizi alamadık. {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Voks{/g} bağlantısı şeni gürültülerle doluydu: Çığlıklar, küfürlü ilahiler ve benzer uğursuzlukta daha nice sesler. Gürültüyü uzun süre dinleyen herkes akıl sağlığını kaybetti. Birkaç düzine operatör, sesinizi duyma umuduyla voksyayarı dinlerken çıldırdı. Bekleyişleri boşuna oldu."
languages.original_text: "I do apologise, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but we were unable to receive your request for evacuation. The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-link{/g} was overrun with vile interference — screams, blasphemous hymns, and other equally sinister noises. Any who listened to the interference for a protracted period lost their sanity. Several dozen operators went mad monitoring the vox-caster in the hope of hearing your voice. Each one of them waited in vain."

traits.locale_text: "Özür dilerim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ancak tahliye talebinizi alamadık. {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Voks{/g} bağlantısı şeni gürültülerle doluydu: Çığlıklar, küfürlü ilahiler ve benzer uğursuzlukta daha başka sesler. Gürültüyü uzun süre dinleyen herkes akıl sağlığını kaybetti. Birkaç düzine operatör, sesinizi duyma umuduyla voksyayarı dinlerken çıldırdı. Bekleyişleri boşuna oldu."
